name: Startup Sonoma
tagline: Moving from Idea to Product in Sonoma County
body:
Helping Sonoma County Entrepreneurs to start companies by having peer
support as well as getting the community services involved around
support the entrepreneurs.

A lot of these ideas are lifted from the book Startup Communities.

# Talks

 - Birthing an Idea
 - Lean Methodology
 - CRMs
 - Accounting
 - Incorporation
 - Landing Site
 - MailChimp
 - CRM

# Partners

The primary partners are entrepreneurs helping other
entrepreneurs. However, we should get the community involved in this
as well. The least useful thing to worry about is VCs as VCs will come
where there is innovation.

 - Accountants
 - Lawyers
 - Web Designers
 - Governments
 - Maker Space
 - Shared Space
 - Mentors
 - Large Companies
 - VC
 - Community College
 - Sonoma State
 - School District
 - Libraries

# Ideas

 - [ ] Young Entrepreneurs (Schools)
   - Teaching entrepreneurship at schools
   - Lifting Latinos, Blacks and women by teaching them
     entrepreneurial skills isntead of working for the man.
 - [ ] Weekly or Biweekly Coffee Meetups for entrepreneurs to throw
   around ideas.
 - [ ] Office Hours
   - [ ] Get help with different things and maybe get some free advice
     for entrepreneurs just starting out.
 - [ ] Bring different service providers together such as lawyer, accountants, etc.
 - [ ] Talks aimed at starting companies. Basic accounting, marketing, etc.
 - [ ] Mentorships
 - [ ] Hackathons
 - [ ] Startup Weekends. Build an app or startup in a weekend.


# Some tenants

- No idea is stupid, they should be validated quickly.
- Reduce wasted time and resources.
- Failure of an idea is not a failure of the individual.
- Give before you get.
- Entrepreneurship is the future of America.
- Entrepreneurship is Community Service.
